channel.title: [PI] Help, REP+++
channel.description: I can't attack tormented demons or corp on my server, added hp to them, but I still can't attack... help?

item.title: [PI] Help, REP+++
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

had this problem:
go to \Data\cfg\npc.cfg…
then ctrl + f and find your torm demons
put this in for them

and then ctrl + f and find your corp, put this in for them:

THEN: go to spawn-cfg.cfg
ctrl + f and find this

make sure thats there, if its not then add it…
then, go to your NPCDrops.tcm (open with notepad)
then ctrl + f your corp and your torm
make sure you have this for the drops, (or else it won’t drop anything)
you need TWO lines of the drops or else it doesnt work, heres mine:

#Corporeal Beast 8133:95 1512:100 1516:100 1514:100 1212:100 454:300 890:5 537:50 9144:250 452:100 258:50 3001:10 6685:28 537:10 7061:150 9244:150 13736:1
for corp, and this for torm:

#torm demon 8349:70 536:2 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 2362:10 11212:10 11335:1 1319:1 11732:1 13661:1 995:2000000 14484:1

if this stuff doesn’t work pm me

Read full topic

All I can say is make sure that they are added correctly, spawned correctly, and make sure to compile. lol
